name: Sophie's Quest (Jaedon)
description:
Sophie is a witch's familiar. One day, an evil knight raids her castle, and throws Sophie out of the tower! Help her save her witch and take back her home!

Sophie's Quest is a platformer I made in early 2016, for a DigiPen course I took in high school. It's not my best, but I'm proud of it and it helped me get where I am today.

CONTROLS

  • [Arrow Keys] - Move
  • [Shift] - Sprint
  • [Z] - Jump/Select
  • [X] - Rolling attack
  • [C] - Magic attack (if you've collected a power)
  • [S] - Cycle through magic powers
